answers.answer: Mine started in week 20, and it was very heavy leakage. But now I am in week 29 and I barely have any.
Mines started at 20 weeks as well and it wasn't alot but just enough for me to change my shirts..lol now at 26 weeks really don't see it anymore
My breasts has just started leaking last week. I'm 31 1/2 weeks pregnant now and they are constantly leaking.
With my first I leaked a little bit of colostrum in my final weeks, but my milk didn't come in until about 2 wks after my daughter was born.
I'm 32+5.  Not leaking but fluid comes out when I squeeze

I'm not a medical professional but mine leaked quite a lot from weeks 21-25 then it tapered off and stopped. I'm now 36+6 and I've had the odd day of leaking in the last couple of weeks. I also leaked the same with my first. Never had any problems, perfectly normal. I've never heard about a relation to gestational diabetes. Some women leak some don't, I don't think it means anything :)
I'm 35 weeks and haven't had any leakage :-(
i thought there was something important about colostrum and gestational diabetes. I have a docs and midwifes app next week so i'll add it to my list of questions

question: Hi ladies, ftm, can u tell me when this started for u? I've read a few things about gestational diabetes and milk. Dont have another doc app for 2 months, can anyone medical give me some advice?
title: breast milk leaking at 27 & 1/2 w
